Login.heading: Impact Voice
Login.disclaimer: To sign-in enter your phone number beginning with country code 228, then check for a message from Impact Voice (Sandbox) and enter your code in the pop-up.

Onboarding.heading: Create Profile
Onboarding.disclaimer: Your information will not be shared with the public and will only be used for identification purposes and to contact you if necessary.

Proposals.heading: Proposals
Proposals.nullMessage: There are currently no proposals or there is a problem with your connection.

Create Proposal.proposalContext: Please fill out the form below to create a proposal.
Create Proposal.problemContext: Give a summary and include statistics if necessary to show that this problem is a detriment to the community
Create Proposal.solutionContext: Tell us what you plan to do about the problem and prove that your solution will work.
Create Proposal.detailsContext: Provide more information about your proposal.
Create Proposal.budgetContext: Amount in CFA (not USD or other), not exceeding 12,000,000 CFA.
Create Proposal.collaboratorsPlaceholder: If you are collaborating with other people on this application to make this proposal, search for them and add them here.
Create Proposal.communityValidationMessage: Please provide people and venders involved.
Create Proposal.milestonesContext: Break your plan into steps. Show us what each step along the way will cost.
Create Proposal.reviewContext: Please review your proposal before submitting.
